results.text: በዚህ ውስጥ ለሚፈራ ሰው በእርግጥ መገምገሚያ አለበት፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ባፈጣጠር እናንተ ይበልጥ የበረታችሁ ናችሁን? ወይንስ ሰማይ? (አላህ) ገነባት፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
